BIO

A highly motivated and creative web developer with strong background in HTML, CSS & server side css, Javascript. Proficient in building responsive and user friendly websites, Experience in working with popular front-end frameworks such as react and Next.js. Passionate about learning new technologies and keeping up with the latest trends
